title: (x) "Cars" Pixar movie logo retro script - Magneto {Tiff}
content:
Thanks for taking the time to review my request.

Here's a link to the image that contains the font. I'm looking for the font or a font similar to the "Cars" portion of the lettering.

[http://www.pixar.com/images/home-cars5/home\_tr.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120504003958/http:/www.pixar.com/images/home-cars5/home_tr.jpg "http://www.pixar.com/images/home-cars5/home\_tr.jpg")

Thanks!
author: stotion

comments.content:
You might want to consider Rocket Script by Font Diner:  
 [http://www.fontdiner.com/main.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120504003958/http:/www.fontdiner.com/main.html "http://www.fontdiner.com/main.html")  
(Go to Free Silverware.)

Whenever you're looking for typefaces on movie posters, just do a search on [Unzipped](http://web.archive.org/web/20120504003958/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=46), my blog. And now that I'm switching to English you'll be able to read it. ;^)

_»And now that I’m switching to English you’ll be able to read it.«_

Really? Thank you. Much appreciated.
